[`ar_image_anchor_get_estimated_scale_factor`](/documentation/arkit/ar_image_anchor_get_estimated_scale_factor)Gets the estimated scale factor between the tracked image’s physical size and the collection.[`ar_image_tracking_provider_create`](/documentation/arkit/ar_image_tracking_provider_create)Creates an image tracking provider that tracks the reference images you supply.[`ar_image_tracking_provider_is_supported`](/documentation/arkit/ar_image_tracking_provider_is_supported)Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the current runtime environment supports required to track images.[`ar_image_tracking_provider_set_update_handler`](/documentation/arkit/ar_image_tracking_provider_set_update_handler)Sets the handler for receiving image tracking updates.[`ar_image_tracking_provider_set_update_handler_f`](/documentation/arkit/ar_image_tracking_provider_set_update_handler_f)Sets the handler for receiving image tracking updates.[`ar_image_tracking_configuration_add_reference_images`](/documentation/arkit/ar_image_tracking_configuration_add_reference_images)Adds reference images to the set to be tracked.[`ar_image_tracking_configuration_create`](/documentation/arkit/ar_image_tracking_configuration_create)Creates an image tracking configuration.[`ar_reference_images_t`](/documentation/arkit/ar_reference_images_t)A collection of reference images.[`ar_reference_images_enumerator_t`](/documentation/arkit/ar_reference_images_enumerator_t)A handler for enumerating a collection of reference images.[`ar_reference_images_add_image`](/documentation/arkit/ar_reference_images_add_image)Adds a reference image to a collection.
